metadata.name: Unconditional Remnant #1
metadata.description:
<< Unconditional Remnant #1 >>

Unconditional Remnants is a collaborative artwork between Thomas Noya & Miguel Noya. An exploration into reactions of extreme emotional distress and the illusory effects of words in the imagination – The feelings of a nomad facing the ocean while fixating on the nostalgic memories of the stillness of sea waves and pulsating hearts.

•

Visuals: Thomas Noya.
Music: Miguel Noya.

1080 x 1080 px | 30 fps | 00:30 | mp4

2021

•

This piece was created by combining multiple latent space interpolations from various personal GAN models and original music.

•

Feel free to contact me for access to a hi-res version.
